{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Z-Com |model=LANEscape WL2450 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=04/27/1999 |manuf_country=Taiwan |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=rare |type=access point |fcc_id=M4Y-WL2450 |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=0.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=AMD |cpu1_model=Am79C930VC |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=0.125 |fla1_brand=AMD |fla1_model=Am29F010-120EC |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=0.125 |ram1_brand=ISSI |ram1_model=IS62C1024-45T |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=DE-9,, (19200,8,N,1) |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=AMD |wi1_chip1_model=Am79C930VC |wi1_chip2_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip2_model=HFA3824A |wi1_chip3_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=legacy (DSSS) |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu= |eth_chip1_brand=Realtek |eth_chip1_model=RTL8019AS |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=10M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=legacy (DSSS) |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:60:B3 |oui_eth=00:60:B3 |default_ch= }} [http://www.teletronics.com/WLAccesspoint2.html Product page for the model distributed by '''Teletronics''']
"WL2450 D/B V1.2" is silkscreened on a production board. :"AIRETHERNET CIRCUIT BOARD REV:1.0" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
==Images== <gallery caption="external"> Image:Z-Com_WL2450_top.jpg|top Image:Z-Com_WL2450_bottom_and_label.jpg|bottom and label Image:Z-Com_WL2450_label.jpg|label Image:Z-Com_WL2450_back_ports.jpg|back ports </gallery>[[Has images::external| ]][[Has images::label| ]] <gallery caption="internal"> Image:Z-Com_WL2450_board_top.jpg|board top Image:Z-Com_WL2450_bt_AMD_AM79C930VC.jpg|AMD AM79C930VC controller Image:Z-Com_WL2450_bt_HFA3824AIV.jpg|HFA3824A DSSS baseband Image:Z-Com_WL2450_bt_AM29F010-120EC.jpg|AMD Flash Image:Z-Com_WL2450_bt_RTL8019AS.jpg|RTL8019AS Ethernet controller Image:Z-Com_WL2450_bt_ST16C550CJ.jpg|ST16C550CJ UART chip Image:Z-Com_WL2450_bt_MAC_label.jpg|MAC label on the shield Image:Z-Com_WL2450_bt_silkscreened_text.jpg|silkscreened text Image:Z-Com_WL2450_bt_angled_top_left_side.jpg|angled top, left side Image:Z-Com_WL2450_bt_angled_top_right_side.jpg|angled top, right side Image:Z-Com_WL2450_bt_over_power_serial_etc.jpg|over the power, serial, etc Image:Z-Com_WL2450_bt_angled_top_from_back.jpg|angled top, from the back Image:Z-Com_WL2450_board_bottom.jpg|board bottom </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
